original_text:
I will plant them on their land,
    and they shall never again be uprooted
    out of the land that I have given them,”
says the Lord your God.
korean_text: 내가 그들을 그들의 땅에 심으리니 그들이 내가 준 땅에서 다시 뽑히지 아니하리라 네 하나님 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: I will plant them on their land
and they shall never again be uprooted
out of the land that I have given them
